title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: (i) This Order may be cited as the National Minimum Wage Order
text_raw:
1. 

(i) This Order may be cited as the National Minimum Wage Order
text_norm: 1 (i) order may cited national minimum wage order

title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: (ii) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2024.
text_raw:
2023. 

(ii) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2024.

title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: It is hereby declared that the national minimum hourly rate of pay for
text_raw:
2. 

It is hereby declared that the national minimum hourly rate of pay for 
the purposes of the National Minimum Wage Acts 2000 and 2015 shall be 
€12.70.
text_norm: 2 hereby declared national minimum hourly rate pay purpose national minimum wage act 2000 2015 shall eur12.70

title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: 3. The national minimum hourly rate of pay may include the following
text_raw:
3. The national minimum hourly rate of pay may include the following 

allowances: 

(i) 

for board only, €1.14 per hour worked 

(ii) 

for lodgings only, €30.00 per week, or €4.28 per day. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 October, 2023. 

SIMON COVENEY, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 20th October, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [497] 3
text_norm: 3 national minimum hourly rate pay may include following allowance (i) board eur1.14 per hour worked (ii) lodging eur30.00 per week eur4.28 per day given official seal 11 october 2023 simon coveney minister enterprise trade employment notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 20th october 2023 497 3

title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Order sets the national minimum hourly rate of pay from 1 January 2024 
at €12.70, and the board and lodging rates as follows: 

Lodgings: €30.00 per week, or €4.28 per day. 

Board: €1.14 per hour worked. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [497]
